description.english: Take her down a notch. Princesses have like a thousand notches anyhow.
Stretch out the walk with the Princess as much as you can.
Leave a room of real men, likely while wetting yourself.
Get your ass kicked for the first time.
Bear witness to an incredible power.
Get stabbed in the back by someone you trust.
Be a bad boy. Really bad.
Be a miniscule canine member of the female gender why don’cha?
When danger doth rear its ugly head, venture yonder now back to bed.
As if dying wasn’t bad enough.
This could be the last chance to tell her.
Do people know about this?! Find out a crazy secret.
Practice your control over the elements.
Take something that don’t belong to you, again.
Get a perfect score at... stalking.
Defeat the Nephilim of the Sea.
Make a damn fool of yourself.
Confess love to a fairy. (you freak)
Complete the main path of the Vienna Chapter.
Fend off your ancient nemesis. For now...
Throw away everything you believe in for a laugh. Worth it.
Change your perspective an ungodly amount of times.

name: Aint No One Got Time Fo Dat

displayName.english: Aint No One Got Time Fo Dat

description.english: Read Set’s letter all the way through.
Pick different candlesticks in subsequent playthrus.
Who says dungeons have to be torture?
Put an end to the sickness.
Enjoy the comedic stylings of Zack Black.
Land the finishing blow against Heibi-Jeibi while powered up with Raging Earth.
Against Baracoda, heal yourself with Silver Streams when your health is under 25%, and win.
Connect Squal Blade at least 10x against Silicon and win.
Connect at least 5 Fire Blasts against Set in Rome, despite his imperviousness, and win anyway.
Experience everything nature has to offer.
Enjoy the Charadex for quite some time.
Take quite a lot of snapshots.
Keep quite a bit of snapshots.
Tend to snapshots for quite some time.
Take a snapshot of a girl in bed.

name: Ding Dong Your Opinion is Wrong

displayName.english: Ding Dong Your Opinion is Wrong

description.english: Get the Gold-rank card of your favorite progena.
Do glorious battle throughout the lands.
Achieve Adam Level 70 in Story Mode.
Achieve Adam Level 31 in Rumble Mode.
Achieve Alex Level 37 in Rumble Mode.
Achieve Helena Level 33 in Rumble Mode.
Achieve Set Level 36 in Rumble Mode.
Achieve Nephilim Level 34 in Rumble Mode.
An Achievement of luck with a <1% chance of occurring at the start of every scene in the Story.

name: A Blink in the Eye of Eternity

displayName.english: A Blink in the Eye of Eternity
